title: BIP 58: Emissions ibBTC/WBTC SLP Sett incentives
body:
TLDR;

Add ibBTC/WBTC SLP Sett to the general emission structure with a multiplier chosen by the governance.
1.5x multiplier would keep the rewards for the Sett for the following week at around the same level as they are now.
2x multiplier would put ibBTC SLP Sett at the same level of rewards long term as the byWBTC Sett.
The higher the multiplier, the larger is the % of rewards that is reallocated to ibBTC Sett from other non-native Setts.
Link to Discussions: https://forum.badger.finance/t/bip-58-emissions-ibbtc-wbtc-slp-sett-incentives/4706
author: 0xa7167Eb0bD25Ec540798C9b23f8E1965Ed6FdE10
